fields.name: Stonewall (Night, 3 uses):
fields.value: ~~Occupy~~ *Roleblock* everyone targeting your target, except those attacking or converting your target. You cannot target the same player 2 nights in a row.

fields.name: Divert (Night):
fields.value:
Redirect target player to another.
- Can't target the King.
- Conflicting redirects may fail

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose.
